title: Funerary inscription for Alb[----] Pompeius Marcellus

editionAuthor.title: Iscrizioni Latine nuove e vecchie della Sicilia
editionAuthor.citation: Giacomo Manganaro, «Iscrizioni Latine nuove e vecchie della Sicilia», Epigraphica 51 (1989): 161–96

support: A marble plaque, broken off above and lower left, but with parts of left and right margin and lower right corner preserved. Text is framed within a double border.

layout.p: Text is framed by a double border, with well spaced letters filling the field.

handNote.lettering: Well-spaced letters with a broad module, large, rounded C, open P, well-formed serifs.

date._: Manganaro suggests C1 BCE (on the basis of lettering?), but concedes it could be imperial, and a first century CE date seems more likely.

provenanceFound._: Described by Manganaro simply as found at Morgantina, in the property of a citizen of Aidone; apparently gifted to Manganaro, and not seen since.

bibl.title: L'année épigraphique: revue des publications épigraphiques relatives a l'antiquité romaine.
